Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000001>珍しいな。 この辺りは、あまり雨が 降らないはずだが……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000001>How unusual... This region doesn't normally experience rainfall.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000002>ミナールまでは、あと少しだよ。 本降りになる前に、 この荒野を突っ切ろうよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000002>Just a little further until Minal. Let's cut across these plains before the rain starts coming down hard.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000004>ああ。だが、ミナールは もう目と鼻の先だ。 このまま行こう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000004>Yes, but we must be close to Minal. Let's keep our current pace.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000007>気のせいかもしれないが、 さっきもここを通らなかったか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000007>Maybe it's just my imagination, but didn't we already come this way?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000008>そんなはずないと思うけど？
<voice:10000009>地形やまわりの風景が 似ているような気がする……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000009>The terrain and scenery around here feel very familiar to me...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000000a>確かに……そろそろ前方に ミナールが見えてきても おかしくないはずだが…… 道を間違えたか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000000A>I agree. Minal should be within our sight by now. Have we taken a wrong turn?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000000b>雨で見えないだけでしょ？ なんだか寒くなってきたし、 スピードアップして行こうよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000000B>It's probably just the rain mucking up our vision. Let's hurry up, it's starting to get chilly out here.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000000d>言ってるそばから 雪が降って来たよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000000D>As soon as I mention the cold, it starts to snow!
<voice:1000000E>I've got a bad feeling about this...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000000f>もおッ、<Eugene>!! ヘンなこと言わないでヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000000F>Oh come on, <Eugene>! Don't say stuff like that!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000010>とにかく、ミナールへ急ごう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000010>At any rate, we'd better hurry to Minal.
<voice:10000013>For a split second, I sensed bloodlust...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000014>やめてよー、<Veigue>まで。 気のせいじゃないの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000014>Not you too, <Veigue>! It's just your imagination, right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000002a>そろそろ出てきたらどうなの？ もうキミのフォルスは逃がさないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000002A>Come out, come out wherever you are! Your Force won't help you run now!
<voice:1000002B>...I see there is no use in hiding anymore.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000002d>さすがね……でも、もう充分。 雨に打たれながら歩き続けて、 心も体も疲れきってるでしょ？ ……今、わたしが楽にしてあげるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000002D>Well noticed. Now, that's enough. You must be tired from walking in the rain for so long. I'll make your death quick and painless.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000031>わたしの狙いは、その汚らわしき ガジュマの罪人、ただひとり！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000031>My target is that despicable Gajuma criminal, and him alone!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000033>やはりガジュマ…… その程度の傷では、 痛みすら感じないのね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000033>You're a Gajuma all right... Even a wound that deep causes you no pain.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000034>でも、ヒューマの父は違った…… 苦しみと絶望の中、 自分を刺した親友の名前を 呼びつづけた……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000034>But that wasn't the case for my Huma father. In the midst of his pain and despair, he kept calling out the name of the loyal friend who stabbed him...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000035><Eugene>・ガラルド!! あなたの名前を!!
<voice:10000038>そう、ガジュマに命を奪われた ドクター・バースの娘。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000038>That's right, I am the daughter of Doctor Barrs, whose life was taken by this Gajuma!
<voice:1000003A>Don't you say my name so easily!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000003b>わたしはあなたを絶対に許さない…… 命をもってその罪を償いなさい!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000003B>I will never forgive you for what you have done. You'll pay for your sin with your life!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000003f>ヒューマに用はない。 下がってな！
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000003F>We have no business with you Huma. Don't get in our way.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000040>ガジュマさんよ、 あんたに恨みはないが、 俺たちも仕事なんでな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000040>Nothing personal against you, Gajuma, but we have a job to do.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000042>どうする<Eugene>？ あの子も戦う気みたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000042>What should we do, <Eugene>? She clearly wants a fight...
<voice:1000004D>...So this is how much it hurt...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000004f>バースが味わった痛みを、俺に 思い知らせたかったんじゃないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000004F>You wanted to make me feel the same pain that I inflicted upon your father, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000050>わたしはあなたを許さない…… 父の命を奪ったのは、 あなただから……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000050>I cannot forgive what you have done... You’re the one who took my father from me!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000051>そうだ…… 俺がバースの命を奪った。 その事実に変わりはない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000051>That's right... I killed Barrs. That fact cannot be changed.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000052>俺は逃げない。 この痛みから……俺の犯した罪から。 そして、おまえからも。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000052>I won't run away. Not from this wound... Not from my sins... And not from you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000054>それが俺にできる、 たったひとつの償いだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000054>That is the only thing I can do to atone.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000055>おまえの気が済むまで…… バースの痛みがわかるまで、 俺は何度でもおまえに刺されてやる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000055>Until you find peace of mind... Until I understand Barrs' suffering... I won't avoid your attacks, no matter how many times you strike.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000056>だから、二度とこんな無茶はするな。 命を粗末にするような事はするな。 バースのためにも……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000056>So don't be so rash a second time, and don't be so careless with your own life. For your father's sake...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000057>これから、どうしたらいいの…… お父さん…… たったひとりの家族だったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000057>I don't know what to do... Father... He was my only family, and yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000058>……俺を憎め。 俺を殺すために生きろ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000058>...Hate me. Live so that you can take my life with your own hands.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000005a>俺にはやらなくてはならない事がある。 今はまだ、死ぬわけにはいかない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000005A>There's still something I need to do, so I can’t let myself die just yet.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000005b>だが、その目的を達したならば、 この命をおまえに捧げると約束する。 だから……生きろ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000005B>But once my goal is achieved, I promise I will give my life up to you. So... live.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000005d>……あなたに……そんな事…… 言われ……なくても……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000005D>I don’t need to... be told something like that... from the likes of you...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000005f>許さない……あなたを…… 絶対に……ゆ……
<voice:10000060>いかん……!! 今の戦いで、相当体力を 消耗しているようだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000060>Damn it! She seems to have exhausted all of her strength in that battle.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000061>かなりフォルスを使ってたし、 精神的にもキビシイはず……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000061>Well, she didn't exactly go easy with her Force, and she got all emotional too.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000062>ミナールにも医者はいるだろう。 急ごう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000062>There must be a doctor in Minal. We need to hurry.
<voice:10000064>She's the daughter of my dear friend.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000065>でも、その娘は<Eugene>の 命を狙ってるんだよ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000065>Even if she wants to kill you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000066>ああ、彼女が回復すれば、 俺は再び命を狙われるかもしれない。 だが、それが彼女の生きる力に なるのなら……それでいい。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000066>Yes. If she recovers, she'll likely try to take my life once more. But if it gives her the will to live...so be it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:10000068>……だったら約束して。 彼女が生きるために <Eugene>の命を大事にするって。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:10000068>Then you have to promise me something, too. Promise me that you won't be reckless with your own life. So she'll keep on living.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:1000006b><Veigue>って、 なんだかんだ言いながらも、 やっぱり優しいよネ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:1000006B>Aw <Veigue>, even though you act all cold, deep down you've got a kind heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f00008c>そう、ガジュマに命を奪われた ドクター・バースの娘。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F00008C><voice:10000038>That's right, I am the daughter of Doctor Barrs, whose life was taken by this Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f00008f>わたしはあなたを絶対に許さない…… 命をもってその罪を償いなさい!!
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F00008F><voice:1000003B>I will never forgive you for what you have done. You'll pay for your sin with your life!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000091>そうだ…… 俺がバースの命を奪った。 その事実に変わりはない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000091><voice:10000051>That's right... I killed Barrs. That fact cannot be changed.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000092>俺は逃げない。 この痛みから……俺の犯した罪から。 そして、おまえからも。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000092><voice:10000052>I won't run away. Not from this wound... Not from my sins... And not from you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000093>それが俺にできる、 たったひとつの償いだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000093><voice:10000054>That is the only thing I can do to atone.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000094>おまえの気が済むまで…… バースの痛みがわかるまで、 俺は何度でもおまえに刺されてやる。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000094><voice:10000055>Until you find peace of mind... Until I understand Barrs' suffering... I won't avoid your attacks, no matter how many times you strike.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000095>だから、二度とこんな無茶はするな。 命を粗末にするような事はするな。 バースのためにも……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000095><voice:10000056>So don't be so rash a second time, and don't be so careless with your own life. For your father's sake...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000096>これから、どうしたらいいの…… お父さん…… たったひとりの家族だったのに……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000096><voice:10000057>I don't know what to do... Father... He was my only family, and yet...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000097>……俺を憎め。俺を殺すために生きろ。 俺にはやらなくてはならない事がある。 今はまだ、死ぬわけにはいかない。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000097>...Hate me. Make my death your purpose for living. There's still something I have to do, so I can’t let myself die just yet.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000098>だが、その目的を達したならば、 この命をおまえに捧げると約束する。 だから……生きろ。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000098><voice:1000005B>But once my goal is achieved, I promise I will give my life up to you. So... live.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2f000099>……あなたに……そんな事…… 言われ……なくても……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2F000099><voice:1000005D>I don’t need to... be told something like that... from the likes of you...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
